title: Rewards (Part 2)
body:
Rewards (Part 2)

Valery who just coughed out cola after seeing Evan using ice chains wiped her mouth and sat down.

After sitting down she started to drink cola again, but just as she drank again a light blue aura burst forth from Evan's body.

Pff cough*cough*

"What the fu*k?" Valery can't help but curse, and spat out cola again after feeling how Evan's aura suddenly skyrocketed, and was even stronger than a C+ rank hunter.

Her mouth opened and closed like a goldfish but no word come out from her mouth.

She wasn't even able to come out from the shock of Evan using ice chains, and now his power suddenly increased beyond C+ rank.

'Is this guy really a D rank hunter?' Valery thought and remember the reason why she need the ice heart flower.

'Even if my physique is fully awakened I don't think I can go past C+ rank while being a D rank hunter.'

Valery also has a unique physique called the ice reaper physique.
